main_definition: Fresh refers to something that is newly made or obtained, has a recently harvested quality, or gives an impression of being clean and rejuvenating.

meanings_and_examples.example: I bought some fresh vegetables from the local market.
The bakery sells only fresh bread every morning.
A cold, fresh shower can help you feel more awake in the morning.
I prefer my steak cooked but having a side of fresh fruit is always nice.
The summer breeze felt so refreshing after being stuck in the heat all day.
She chose a fresh apple from the tree instead of one that had fallen on the ground.
